content.raw:
yes, just happened with this commit.  Which log file is missing pose information?  The one that I can read shows all the data there.  I can't do anything about the state.log file, as that is generated by the sim and is not human readable.  If it is missing pose data, then I am stuck.
I used those same log files with your earlier commit-- the one where the poses showed up as 0's. But that file ran without errors. I'll try it with some other log files.
